text: Waterparks is an American pop rock band formed in 2011 in Houston, Texas. The members of the group are Awsten Knight (lead vocalist, rhythm guitar), Geoff Wigington (lead guitar, backing vocals) and Otto Wood (drums). The group have released three EPs; two were released independently while the third was released under Equal Vision. They released their first full-length album, Double Dare, on November 4th, 2016 under Equal Vision, then their second, Entertainment, under the same label on January 26th, 2018. The band officially announced that they had left Equal Vision on May 23rd, 2019, and revealed that they were under Hopeless Records. Their third full-length album, Fandom, was released under Hopeless on October 11th, 2019. The group signed with 300 Entertainment but switched to Fueled By Ramen in 2023 (?). == EPs == * Airplane Conversations (2012) * Black Light (2014) * Cluster (2016) == Studio albums == * Double Dare (2016) * Entertainment (2018) * Fandom (2019) * Greatest Hits (2021) * Intellectual Property (2023) ==References== Category:American pop rock bands Category:Musical groups from Houston Category:21st-century establishments in Texas Category:2011 establishments in the United States
title: Waterparks (band)
